_header: Lithe and listen both old and young
_description: A carol of the Nativity — seven quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Of a rose a louely rose / Of a rose I syng a song’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Lyth & lystyn both old & ȝyngHow þe rose be gane
                    to spryng…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…In euery ball to ben owr bottSo blessedly yt
                    sprong

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Herkyn to me both old & yongeHow a rose began to
                    sprynge…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Now cryst saue all this cumpany& send vs gud lyff &
                    longExplicit
